languages.text: "Мой господин Торбальд, я немедленно распоряжусь, чтобы на офицерской палубе все приготовили к пиру".
"My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."
languages.original_text: "Мой господин Торбальд, я немедленно распоряжусь, чтобы на офицерской палубе все приготовили к пиру".

traits.locale_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."
"My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."
"My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."
"My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

languages.text: «Mi señor Thorbald, ordenaré inmediatamente a cada oficial de la cubierta que empiecen a preparar un festín».
languages.original_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

traits.locale_text: «Mi señor Thorbald, ordenaré inmediatamente a cada oficial de la cubierta que empiecen a preparar un festín».

languages.text: “索巴德大人，我立刻命令甲板上的所有军官准备一场盛宴。”
languages.original_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

traits.locale_text: “索巴德大人，我立刻命令甲板上的所有军官准备一场盛宴。”

languages.text: 「トールバルド卿、甲板上の士官全員に直ちに宴会の準備を始めるよう命じよう」
languages.original_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

traits.locale_text: 「トールバルド卿、甲板上の士官全員に直ちに宴会の準備を始めるよう命じよう」

languages.text: « Noble seigneur Thorbald, je vais de ce pas ordonner à tous les officiers sur le pont de nous préparer un grand banquet. »
languages.original_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

traits.locale_text: « Noble seigneur Thorbald, je vais de ce pas ordonner à tous les officiers sur le pont de nous préparer un grand banquet. »

languages.text: "Mein Lord Thorbald, ich werde augenblicklich jedem Offizier an Deck befehlen, Vorbereitungen für ein Festmahl zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Lord Thorbald, ich werde augenblicklich jedem Offizier an Deck befehlen, Vorbereitungen für ein Festmahl zu treffen."

languages.text: "Lordum Thorbald, güvertedeki tüm subaylara derhâl ziyafet için hazırlanmalarını emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "My lord Thorbald, I shall immediately order every officer on deck to begin preparations for a feast."

traits.locale_text: "Lordum Thorbald, güvertedeki tüm subaylara derhâl ziyafet için hazırlanmalarını emrediyorum."
